name: Greyknurl Diahaze
description:
A fairly old-school puzzle game cast in a cyberpunky world. Turn-based and thoughtful, approachable in different ways. Follow a lore path or a points-scoring path if you prefer. Learn some fun new abstract puzzle elements and push some blocks around!

Use the cursor keys to move, z and x when necessary. Everything is explained a little in-game but experimentation teaches you the game best.

All this made in pico-8, an all-in-one environment for tiny games! This game will be free of charge forever; if you like the concept or you like the music, then thank you, and if you want to send me a little money, visit my profile for a link to my patreon site where you can subscribe for as little as you like. No obligation, a comment here and there is just as welcome!

game by Zan-zan-zawa-veia, made over June and July of 2019, learning precarious lua code as I went.
